A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While initially exciting\, after taking time to really think about the film. huge problems emerge. From the ridiculous \"sidequest\" to the poor choices in story progression and lack of backstory\, The Last Jedi suffers from many poor choices. Beautiful to look at\, genuinely funny moments\, and several fantastic action scenes still make this a must-see film\, but this is far from the best film in the Star Wars Universe.
